title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Popular Mountain Biking Routes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Trip Itineraries     Popular Mountain Biking Routes              Popular Mountain Biking Routes          On the maps, the trails are marked with an alternating black and white line. 1. West Bandy Creek-Collier Ridge Mountain Bike Route - 9.8 miles (2.3 MB pdf) 2. Duncan Hollow-John Muir-Grand Gap Bike Route - 16.8 miles (2.5 MB pdf) 3. Big South Fork Epic Bike Route - 32.7 miles (3.1 MB pdf) 4. Kentucky Trail Mountain Bike Loops - 18.0 and 33.4 miles (3.1 MB pdf) 5. Chestnut Ridge-John Muir Trail - 10.6 miles (2.4 MB pdf) 6. Hatfield Ridge-Fork Ridge - 21.3 miles (4.3 MB pdf)
